Row.Text: We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
Oh, very well. You may proceed.
You may pass into Egypt, provided you respect our ancient heritage.
I will allow it, for the good of Germany, I hope.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
You may pass through Sumer, my friend. But do not disturb my people.
I will open the borders to you, but do not linger in Sparta.
Yes, explore. The world is too vast to stay in one place.
Your people may pass through our borders, but they must honor our ways.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
Yes, we will allow you to pass through the Democracy. Perhaps you will learn something from us, and we might learn from you.
Very well, I hereby grant you permission to pass through my lands.
Yes, you may pass through my lands. It would not be just to prohibit passage of such a vast Kingdom.
Of course you may pass. What threat could you possibly pose to the Middle Kingdom?
Yes, you may pass through our lands, provided they remain our lands. I will always accept this bargain over warfare.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
In our grateful acknowledgment of a shared wish for peace we accept your forces among our own.
We are not interested at this time.
We are not interested at this time.
Unfortunately, I simply cannot allow it. For safety, of course.
You may not enter Egypt. Only those who are worthy may tread these grounds.
I was not born a fool, to allow my enemies passage through my lands.
We are not interested at this time.
No, you may not pass through Sumer. Only my true allies may enter.
You, who have not bathed in the Eurotas-- who knows nothing of the agoge-- may not pass through Sparta.
I lost my kingdom to such treachery once already… I will not do so again.
The Pure Land is denied to you. Ask yourself “why?”
We are not interested at this time.
Unfortunately, the Democracy has voted against allowing your passage at this time.
I cannot a potential threat into the Motherland. I hope you can understand.
I will not allow you to corrupt my subjects with your tainted ways.
No, I will not allow foreigners to spoil our wondrous empire.
By the grace and mercy of the one true God, I cannot allow foreigners to spoil his holy lands.
We are not interested at this time.
We are not interested at this time.
We are not interested at this time.
For the safety of my people, I must unfortunately deny your request. I do hope you can understand.
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
My military would like permission to pass through your lands. Peacefully, of course.
Let my people pass through your lands. I will make it worth your while…
I must move my army through your land. Will you allow it?
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
Gilgamesh passes through your lands to crush his enemies, yes?
My Spartans wish to pass through your land, will you deny them a chance at valor?
Will you allow my Vikings to pass? They are unruly when they become restless.
I humbly request permission to march through your borders. We will keep the peace.
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
Athens would like to pass through your territory. Will you allow it?
My people would like to pass through your lands, to see more of this world. Would you allow it?
The Kingdom of Spain would kindly request to move through your lands. We mean you no harm.
We must pass through your territory and humbly request permission to enter your domain.
Will you allow my people to pass through your lands? I assure you they will be peaceful.
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
We humbly request access for our soldiers to pass through your domain. What do you say?
Excellent!
That is unfortunate.
We are not going to allow your military within our borders at this time.
Your units are welcome to cross our lands.
